sys_ux_client_script.name: form_default_2/fields

sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record page 3 column layout">cce4954dc3a71210c5d75242b4013166</macroponent><name>form_default_2/fields</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    const fieldsMap = api.data.record.form.fields;
    const filteredFields = {};

    for (const fieldName in fieldsMap) {
        const fieldData = fieldsMap[fieldName];
        const fieldType = fieldData.dictionary.type;

        if (fieldType == 'html' || fieldType == 'translated_html') {
            filteredFields[fieldName] = fieldData;
        }
    }

    return filteredFields;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-02-04 09:03:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>1ce4954dc3a71210c5d75242b40131af</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>form_default_2/fields</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Invoices" source="x_1097202_invoices">48c5f8b7832d521038c8f4a6feaad30d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Invoices">48c5f8b7832d521038c8f4a6feaad30d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_1ce4954dc3a71210c5d75242b40131af</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-02-04 09:03:22</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
